content.p: Keep up to date with what staff and students are doing in the Department of Philosophy. The department runs an extensive series of research and postgraduate seminars. Research seminar listings 2022 2021 2020 2019 2018 2017 2016 2015 2014 2013 2012 2011 2010 2022 2021 2020 2019 2018 2017 2016 2015 2014 2013 2012 2011 2010 Theology and Religion related events are now posted in the Department of Philosophy events list. Theology and Religion related news is now posted in the Department of Philosophy news list. Contact us Twitter
